## Q1 {.unnumbered}

Gaussian elimination: Do e.r.o.s on the following matrices to reduce them to row echelon form or reduced row echelon form.

1\. Give the row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
2 & 4 & 6\\
1 & 3 & 5\\
3 & 7 & 9
\end{bmatrix}.$$

2\. Give the row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
0 & 2 & 1 & 3\\
1 & 1 & 2 & 4\\
2 & 3 & -1 & 5
\end{bmatrix}.$$

3\. Give the row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 1 & 0\\
0 & 0 & 0 & 0\\
1 & 0 & 2 & 1\\
1 & 5 & 1 & 1
\end{bmatrix}.$$

4\. Give the row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 1 & 1\\
2 & 2 & 2\\
3 & 3 & 3
\end{bmatrix}.$$

5\. Give the row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
2 & 5\\
3 & 7
\end{bmatrix}.$$

6\. Give the row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & 2\\
0 & 1 & -1\\
2 & -1 & 3\\
3 & 1 & 0
\end{bmatrix}.$$

7.Give the reduced row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & -1\\
2 & -1 & 1\\
3 & 0 & 2
\end{bmatrix}.$$

8.Give the reduced row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 3 & 4\\
2 & 4 & 6 & 8\\
3 & 6 & 9 & 12
\end{bmatrix}.$$

9.Give the reduced row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 5\\
3 & 4 & 11
\end{bmatrix}.$$

10.Give the reduced row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
2 & 1 & 0\\
1 & 2 & 1\\
0 & 1 & 2
\end{bmatrix}.$$

11.Give the reduced row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
0 & 6 & 0 & 3\\
2 & 1 & 2 & 1\\
0 & 2 & 0 & 1\\
1 & 2 & 0 & 0
\end{bmatrix}.$$

12.Give the reduced row echelon form of $$\quad G=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & -1 & 2 & 3\\
2 & -2 & 4 & 6\\
3 & -3 & 6 & 9
\end{bmatrix}.$$
